item.title: Fitness Boxing Persona 5 announcement teased
item.content:encoded:
"After all, stamina is essential for a Phantom Thief!"

The official Twitter account for the Fitness Boxing series has tweeted an image teasing a potential Fitness Boxing Persona 5.

The Fitness Boxing series has previously released other collaboration games such as Fitness Boxing Fist of the North Star and Fitness Boxing feat. Hatsune Miku.

The teaser image shows the following two quotes from unknown characters in the style of the Persona 5 user interface:

???: What are you getting ready for?

???: Heh heh heh… This time, I’m preparing a training plan that’s a bit different from usual. After all, stamina is essential for a Phantom Thief!

Stay tuned.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/fitness-boxing-persona-5-announcement-teased
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Bloober Team launches ‘Remosd Neul Serorehso Ovam Ceyerd’ countdown website
item.content:encoded:
"Dare to peek into the darkness..."

Bloober Team has launched a countdown teaser website at RemosdNeulSerorehsoOvamCeyerd.com, which ends on February 15, 2026.

The tweet announcing the countdown reads, “Dare to peek into the darkness…”

Further information was not announced.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/bloober-team-launches-remosd-neul-serorehso-ovam-ceyerd-countdown-website
